name: Playing With Traffic
description:
"Why'd the ducks cross the road?"

A question that's been asked for millennia. Scholars and geniuses have spent their entire lives seeking an answer to this engimatic enigma, all to no avail. However, we at Traffic Inc. have finally cracked this cosmic curosity. The answer to this remarkable riddle? "No idea, but it sure makes for some fun gameplay." To prove our conclusion to this puzzling...puzzle, we present: Playing with Traffic.

Keep as many ducks alive for as long as possible!

Q/A will increase/decrease red car speed
W/S will increase/decrease green tanker speed
E/D will increase/decrease blue truck speed

Cars will not run over ducks when their speed is below the black bar

The further you get, and the more ducks you have, the more points you'll earn!

Good luck!
